member.name: D3D12_DRED_FLAGS

blockquote.para: [!NOTE] As of Windows 10, version 1903, D3D12_DRED_FLAGS is deprecated, and it may not be available in future versions of Windows.

summary.para: Defines constants used in the to specify control flags for the Direct3D runtime. Values can be bitwise OR'd together.

member.seealso: Use DRED to diagnose GPU faults

summary.para: Typically specifies that Device Removed Extended Data (DRED) is disabled, except for when user-initiated feedback is used to produce a repro, or when otherwise enabled by Windows via automatic detection of process-instability issues. This is the default value.
Forces DRED to be enabled, regardless of the system state.
